hook.text: Ethereum can handle 15 transactions per second. Visa handles 65,000. Houston, we have a problem.

buildup.text: We can't easily change the main blockchain (Layer 1). So we build on top of it.

discovery.text: Layer 2s bundle hundreds of transactions together, then post one summary to the main chain.

twist.text: Result: transactions that cost $50 on Ethereum cost pennies on Layer 2. Same security, tiny fees.

climax.text: Rollups, sidechains, channels â€” different L2 approaches, all solving the same scaling puzzle.

punchline.text: Layer 2: the express lane that makes blockchain usable for everyone.

quiz.question: What problem do Layer 2 solutions solve?
options: Slow transactions and high fees on the main chain
